titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the first responders and those who lost their lives in the Maui wildfires in August 2023 that affected thousands of people.
Recognizing and honoring the first responders and those who lost their lives in the Maui wildfires in August 2023 that affected thousands of people.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
This resolution honors those who lost their lives in the Maui, Hawaii wildfires and recognizes the first responders who risked their lives to respond to the wildfires.
Further, the resolution urges the people and communities of Hawaii and the United States to act diligently in preventing and preparing for wildfires.
